sqlMap.select: select rn, purchase_no as no, user_no as "user.no", purchase_create_date as createDate, purchase_total_price as totalPrice, PURCHASE_AMOUNT as "purchase.amount", PURCHASE_PRICE as "purchase.price", GAME_TITLE as "game.title" from (select row_number() over (order by a.purchase_no desc) rn, a.purchase_no, a.user_no, a.purchase_create_date, a.purchase_total_price, b.PURCHASE_AMOUNT, b.PURCHASE_PRICE, c.GAME_TITLE from PURCHASES a, PURCHASE_ITEMS b, GAMES c where a.PURCHASE_NO = b.PURCHASE_NO and b.GAME_NO = C.GAME_NO ) where rn >= #begin# and rn <= #end#
select count(*) from purchases a, purchase_items b, games c where a.purchase_no = b.purchase_no and b.game_no = c.game_no and user_no = #value#
select purchase_no as no, user_no as "user.no", purchase_create_date as createDate, purchase_total_price as totalPrice from purchases
select purchase_no as no, user_no as "user.no", purchase_create_date as createDate, purchase_total_price as totalPrice from purchases where user_no = #value# order by purchase_no desc
select purchase_no as no, user_no as "user.no", purchase_create_date as createDate, purchase_total_price as totalPrice from purchases where purchase_no = #value# order by purchase_create_date desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into purchases (purchase_no, user_no, purchase_total_price) values (#no#, #user.no#, #totalPrice#)
